snippet: Mr. Kilty was best known for “Dear Liar,” a play based on letters between George Bernard Shaw and Mrs. Patrick Campbell.
abstract: Jerome Kilty, actor and playwright who made a career of interpreting George Bernard Shaw, dies at age 90.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kilty was best known for “Dear Liar,” a play based on letters between George Bernard Shaw and Mrs. Patrick Campbell.

headline.seo: Jerome Kilty, 90, Actor and Playwright, Dies
headline.main: Jerome Kilty, Who Made a Career of Interpreting Shaw, Dies at 90
headline.print_headline: Jerome Kilty, 90, Who Made A Career of Interpreting Shaw
